quotes.quote: I mean, they say you die twice. One time when you stop breathing and a second time, a bit later on, when somebody says your name for the last time.
quotes.author: Banksy

quotes.quote: A lot of mothers will do anything for their children, except let them be themselves.
quotes.author: Banksy

quotes.quote: Art should comfort the disturbed and disturb the comfortable.
quotes.author: Banksy

quotes.quote: Think outside the box, collapse the box, and take a fucking sharp knife to it.
quotes.author: Banksy
